about_the_game:
Never ignore the past, for it will always come back and bite.

Three months have passed since Dawn's transformation. Her time in Providence remains peaceful, but Mar, the demon king and Lucia's father, is approaching.
His presence will change everything, and not everyone will leave Providence unscathed.



Dawn is now a zombie! While her journey to transition is over, her journey is not. She still has much to learn and accept from herself. Including a mysterious ghost friend which Dawn doesn't know whether they're friendly or quite hostile...


After using magic to bring her friend back, Lucia now has to pay the price. She became a talented alchemist, but can she find a cure before her father takes care of the problem his own way?


Long before Providence, Vulcan had found home in the demon realm. She became part of a family that will soon reunite, yet never seemed so far apart. She must now answer to the choices she made so long ago.


-About 40k words (3-4 hours of playtime)
-A linear story that explore Vulcan's past in the demon realm.
-Animated background and visual effects that give life to the environment!
-An entirely original soundtrack, now even richer!

content_descriptors.notes: Contain mention of sexual activities, sexual violence, death, and depiction of transphobia.

short_description: In this sequel of the LGBT visual novel Reborn a Zombie, Dawn, a trans girl turned zombie, now has to confront her past. However, the Demon King is approaching and his presence will change everything.
